measurements_data.comments: 9; based on various investigations and assessments from 1997-2010; food/organic reported as a range of 25-55.8 percent; wood 0.2-1 percent; paper/cardboard 1.10-19 percent; plastic 3.9-16.4 percent; metal 2.2-3.3 percent; other includes other flammable (6-13.8 percent), other inflammable (0.4-10 percent), other, including e-waste (4.5-12 percent), sand, dust, and sweepings (18-40 percent), and plant residue (1.1-2 percent) waste (average used for all ranges)
